Verses: 1 kutranivaaranapaliyin Pramaanam Ennavendraal, Adhu Magaa Parisuththamaanadhu.
2 sarvaanga Thaganapali Kollappadum Idaththil, Kutranivaarana Paliyum Kollappadavendum: Adhin Raththaththaip Palipeedaththinmel Sutrilum Theliththu,
3 adhinudaiya Kozhuppu Muzhuvadhaiyum, Adhin Vaalaiyum, Kudalgalai Moodiya Kozhuppaiyum,
4 irandu Kundikkaaigalaiyum, Avaigalinmel Siru Kudalgalinidaththilirukkira Kozhuppaiyum, Kundikkaaigalodekoodak Kalleeralinmel Irukkira Javvaiyum Eduththu Seluththuvaanaaga.
5 ivaigalai Aasaariyan Palipeedaththinmel Karththarukkuth Thaganapaliyaagath Thaganikkakkadavan; Adhu Kutranivaarana Pali.
6 aasaariyaril Aanmakkal Yaavarum Adhaip Pusippaargalaaga; Adhu Parisuththa Sthalaththil Pusikkappadavendum, Adhu Magaa Parisuththamaanadhu.
7 paavanivaaranapali Eppadiyo, Kutranivaaranapaliyum Appadiye; Avvirandirkum Pramaanam Ondre: Adhinaale Paavanivirththiseydha Aasaariyanai Adhu Serum.
8 oruvanudaiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyai Seluththina Aasaariyan Thaan Seluththina Thaganapaliyin Tholaith Thanakkaaga Vaiththukkollavendum.
9 aduppile Paagampannappattadhum, Sattiyilum Thattinmelum Samaikkappattadhumaana Pojanapali Yaavum Adhai Seluththugira Aasaariyanudaiyavaigalaayirukkum.
10 enneyile Pisaindhadhum Enneyile Pisaiyaadhadhumaana Sagala Pojanapaliyum Aaronudaiya Kumaarar Yaavarukkum Saripangaaga Seravendum.
11 karththarukku Seluththugira Samaadhaanapaligalin Pramaanam Ennavendraal,

12 adhai Sthoththiraththukkaaga Seluththuvaanaanaal, Avan Sthoththira Paliyodunkooda Enneyile Pisaindha Pulippillaa Adhirasangalaiyum, Enney Poosappatta Pulippillaa Adaigalaiyum Enneyile Pisaindhu Varukkappatta Melliya Maavinaal Seydha Adhirasangalaiyum Padaikkakkadavan.
13 avaigalaip Padaikkiradhum Allaamal, Puliththamaavinaal Seydha Appaththaiyum, Thannudaiya Samaadhaana Paliyaagiya Sthoththirapaliyodukoodap Padaikkavendum.

14 andhap Padaippu Muzhuvadhilum Vagaikku Ovvondrai Eduththuk Karththarukku Ereduththup Padaikkum Paliyaaga Seluththuvaanaaga; Adhu Samaadhaana Paliyin Raththaththaith Theliththa Aasaariyanudaiyadhaagum.
15 samaadhaanapaliyaagiya Sthoththirapaliyin Maamsamaanadhu Seluththappatta Andraithdhiname Pusikkappadavendum; Adhil Ondrum Vidiyarkaalamattum Vaikkappadalaagaadhu.
16 avan Seluththum Pali Poruththanaiyaavadhu Urchaagapaliyaayaavadhu Irukkumaanaal, Adhu Seluththappadum Naalilum, Adhil Meedhiyaayirukkiradhu Marunaalilum Pusikkappadalaam.
17 paliyin Maamsaththil Meedhiyaayirukkiradhu Moondraam Naalil Akkiniyile Sutterikkap Padakkadavadhu.

18 samaadhaanapaliyin Maamsaththil Meedhiyaanadhu Moondraam Naalil Pusikkappadumaanaal, Adhu Angigarikkappadaadhu; Adhai Seluththinavanukku Adhu Palikkaadhu; Adhu Aruvaruppaayirukkum; Adhaip Pusikkiravan Than Akkiramaththai Sumappaan.
19 theettaana Endha Vasthuvilaavadhu Andha Maamsam Pattadhaanaal Adhu Pusikkappadaamal Akkiniyile Sutterikkappadakkadavadhu; Matra Maamsaththaiyo Suththamaayirukkiravanevanum Pusikkalaam.
20 oruvan Theettullavanaayirukkaiyil Karththarudaiya Samaadhaanapaliyin Maamsaththaip Pusiththaal, Avan Than Janaththaaril Iraadhapadikku Aruppundupovaan.

21 manusharudaiya Theettaiyaavadhu, Theettaana Mirugaththaiyaavadhu, Aruvarukkappadaththakka Theettaana Matra Endha Vasthuvaiyaavadhu Oruvan Thottirundhu, Karththarudaiya Samaadhaanapaliyin Maamsaththile Pusiththaal, Avan Than Janangalil Iraadhapadikku Aruppundupovaan Endraar.
22 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
23 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Maadu Aadu Vellaadu Enbavaigalin Kozhuppai Neengal Pusikkalaagaadhu
24 thaanaai Seththa Mirugaththin Kozhuppaiyum, Peerunda Mirugaththin Kozhuppaiyum Palavidhavelaigalukku Vazhangalaam; Aanaalum Neengal Adhai Orupodhum Pusikkalaagaadhu.
25 karththarukkuth Thaganapaliyaaga Seluththappadum Mirugaththin Kozhuppaip Pusikkira Endha Aaththumaavum Than Janangalil Iraadhapadikku Aruppundupovaan.
26 ungal Vaasasthalangalil Engum Yaadhoru Paravaiyin Raththaththaiyaavadhu, Yaadhoru Mirugaththin Raththaththaiyaavadhu Pusikkalaagaadhu.
27 evvidha Raththaththaiyaagilum Pusikkira Evanum Than Janangalil Iraadhapadikku Aruppundupovaan Endru Sol Endraar.
28 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
29 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Karththarukku Samaadhaanapali Seluththugiravan Thaan Seluththum Samaadhaanapaliyaik Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvaruvaanaaga.

30 karththarukkuth Thaganapaliyaagap Padaippavaigalai Avan Kaigale Konduvaravendum; Maarkkandaththaiyum Adhanodekooda Adhinmel Vaiththa Kozhuppaiyum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Asaivaattum Paliyaaga Asaivaattumpadikkuk Konduvarakkadavan.
31 appozhudhu Aasaariyan Andhak Kozhuppaip Palipeedaththinmel Thaganikkavendum; Maarkkandamo Aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Serum.
32 ungal Samaadhaanapaligalil Valadhu Munnanthodaiyai Ereduththup Padaikkum Paliyaagap Padaikkumpadi Aasaariyanidaththil Koduppeergalaaga.
33 aaronudaiya Kumaararil, Samaadhaanapaliyin Raththaththaiyum Kozhuppaiyum Seluththugiravanukku, Valadhu Munnanthodai Pangaaga Serum.

34 isravel Puththirarin Samaadhaanapaligalil Asaivaattum Maarkkandaththaiyum Ereduththup Padaikkum Munnanthodaiyaiyum Naan Avargal Kaiyil Vaangi, Avaigalai Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronukkum Avan Kumaararukkum Isravel Puththirarukkul Nadakkum Niththiya Kattalaiyaagak Koduththen Endru Sol Endraar.
35 karththarukku Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seyyumpadi Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Niyamikkappatta Naalile, Idhu Abishegampannappatta Avargalukkuk Karththarudaiya Thaganapaligalil Kidaikkumpadi Undaana Kattalai.
36 ippadi Avargalukku Isravel Puththirar Thangal Thalaimuraithorum Niththiya Niyamamaagak Kodukkumpadi Karththar Avargalai Abishegampannina Naalile Kattalaiyittaar.
37 sarvaanga Thaganapalikkum Pojanapalikkum Kutranivaarana Palikkum Pradhishtai Paligalukkum Samaadhaana Paligalukkum Aduththa Pramaanam Idhuve.
38 karththarukkuth Thangal Paligalai Seluththavendum Endru Avar Isravel Puththirarukku Seenaai Vanaandharaththile Karpikkumpodhu Ivaigalai Mosekku Seenaai Malaiyil Kattalaiyittaar.
